doc:
Molly Picon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Molly_Picon 0 Molly Picon (Yiddish: מאָלי פּיקאָן‎; February 28, 1898 – April 5, 1992) was a U.S. actress of stage, screen and television, as well as a lyricist and dramatic story-teller.She was first and foremost a star in Yiddish theatre and film, but in time, she turned to English-language productions. Molly_Picon ( Yiddish : מאָלי_פּיקאָן ; February_28_,_1898 – April_5_,_1992 ) was a_U.S._actress of stage_,_screen_and_television , as_well_as a_lyricist_and_dramatic_story-teller . She was first_and_foremost a_star in Yiddish_theatre_and_film , but in time , she turned to English-language_productions .
